title: The Peeper's Story 2 - The Escape Partner
overview: Qing and Xu Xi, embroiled in a long-standing debt, flee to Xiaomeisha. Lai Pijiu, who avenged Hoxha by killing Gao Feng, is wanted by the police and flees to Xiaomeisha. However, he is eventually discovered by Judy, who decides to hunt Lai Pijiu down in Xiaomeisha to avenge her husband. However, she is ultimately defeated and killed by him. Danqing and Xu Xi happen to be filming erotic photography nearby. To escape their debt, they decide to hand over all the photos to the police, ultimately leading to Lai Pijiu's execution. Danqing and Xu Xi decide to stay in Xiaomeisha and continue the successful Qingchun Sunset Photography Studio.
